overview:
What we do is make you look good. Sound smart. And succeed.

We offer more comprehensive services and we work harder on making communication work than we do on making it look good (although award-winning design is one of our strong points).

Pennebaker is a marketing communications company â€“ and there aren’t a lot of firms like us. We’re strategy-driven, success-focused and full of ideas that can help clients send a message, generate momentum and create brand value.

Designer genes. Agency resources. And smart business people. In sync.
